SANCTIONS SIMMERING — The bipartisan gang working on a Russia sanctions bill is “finalizing a couple of elements” but is still hung up on two key provisions, Senate Foreign Relations Committee Chair Bob Menendez (D-N.J.) said Monday night.

A day after saying the group was “on the one-yard line,” Menendez said they’re still trying to find an agreement on how to deal with Nord Stream 2 sanctions as well as the “pre-invasion” sanctions that Republicans have been pushing for.
